commentary: Doherty to Mendis, 1 wide turns down leg and Haddin whips the bails off as Mendis threatens to lift his back leg - he's just kept the toe grounded. Erasmus asks for the replay and Mendis is safe, though he lifts his foot just after the bails come off. A tight one, in the end, though it looked innocuous at first

commentary: McKay to Perera, OUT good catch from Smith! Perera threw everything at that one to a fuller ball, it's flown off a leading edge towards point, Smith looks to chase it back behind square but then has to adjust his movement, and takes it well above his head, facing back towards third man. That was not an easy catch, but Smith made it look pretty comfortable in the end.
text: good catch from Smith! Perera threw everything at that one to a fuller ball, it's flown off a leading edge towards point, Smith looks to chase it back behind square but then has to adjust his movement, and takes it well above his head, facing back towards third man. commentary: Fernando to Haddin, OUT Haddin's on his way, Fernando gets a well deserved second wicket, it was a bouncer that got too high on Haddin, who pulled and the top edge flew high in the air, Fernando ran over to short midwicket to take the catch himself. And then threw the ball up and headed it away!

commentary: Fernando to Hussey, 1 no ball is that out? A big lbw shout from Fernando to a ball that has actually pitched outside leg, and immediately umpire Reiffel lifts his right arm. Fernando starts to celebrate,  then realises Reiffel is signalling a no-ball! It was the right call, too.
